abilityEffect.en: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, search your discard pile for a basic [R] Energy card or a basic [L] Energy card and attach it to Rayquaza. This power can't be used if Rayquaza is affected by a Special Condition or if you have another Rayquaza in play.

effect.en: Discard all Energy attached to Rayquaza.
